title: The war Israel has waged in Gaza is still rocking the music industry
subhead: Boycotts, benefit concerts, open letters: Two years after the war started, more and more musicians have openly supported Palestinians. While many British and Irish artists have spoken out, such activism has struggled to gain traction in France.

title: France's new 'unproductive wealth' tax reflects a limited adjustment
subhead: MPs approved on Friday a modification of the real estate wealth tax. Its base was broadened, but the tax rate was reduced by a third for the very wealthy. Its yield remains unclear.
